ðŸ“– Summary: BunkerWeb is an open-source Web Application Firewall (WAF) that protects web services by integrating seamlessly into existing environments like Docker and Kubernetes. Built on NGINX, it offers a configurable and extensible security solution through a web UI, CLI, and plugin system, ensuring web applications are secure by default.
